plot: Dance for Me is a four minute slice of park-based urban surrealism, loosely touching on topics such as teenage boredom, racism, and middle-class fear. And dancing.
title: Dance for Me
plot_es: Dance for Me is a four minute slice of park-based urban surrealism, loosely touching on topics such as teenage boredom, racism, and middle-class fear. And dancing.
plot_en: Dance for Me is a four minute slice of park-based urban surrealism, loosely touching on topics such as teenage boredom, racism, and middle-class fear. And dancing.
